How to reach us

by public transport:

  • travel to station: "Awesome Station"
  • go north
  • turn left at supermaket
  • theater is on right hand side

by car

  • set your navigation to "Awesome Street 11"
  • park your car at public parking location
  • move east and find the theater on left hand side

About us

Unwind and get set to lose yourself in the film ahead with soothing hot drinks and scrumptious snacks at our Costa as well as icy indulgences with Ben and Jerry's. We also have a licensed bar serving of alcoholic and soft drinks, all of which can be taken into your film for a luxurious viewing experience.

General Manager: Trevor Cavell We have 1 monster IMAX screen for immersive, eye-popping entertainment. Treat yourself to an exclusive entertainment experience with our Premier seats and double Premier seats, cafe culture at Costa and icy indulgences at Ben and Jerry's. Online bookers can also enjoy super speedy ticket pick up at our 3 fast ticket machines in the main foyer.
